text: @CyrilRamaphosa @realDonaldTrump When I heard you refer to Covid-19 as the desease from Wuhan, China, I knew that Trump had something to do with it. You were short of calling it the Chinese virus, just like Donna Donny did a few weeks back. We see you Mr Pres. Pity you couldn't see us with that mask obscuring
